physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''B.B. 171 Cowan Contest Winner; Left Max Frankel -; Front L. to R.; Cynthia Miller - parents Mr. and Mrs. Myron Miller - Temple Em.; Brenda Goorian - parents Mr. and Mrs. Phillip Goorian - Temple Em.; Marv Segall - parents Mr. and Mrs. Bernard Segall - Hillel Acad.; Anne Hermann - parents Dr. and Mrs. Gilbert Hermann - Temple Em.; Susan Freeman - parents Mr. and Mrs. Samuel Freeman - Temple Em.; Back L. to R.; Pam Kamlet - parents Mr. and Mrs. Herbert Kamlet - Temple Em.; Allah Gladstone - parents Mr. Eugene Gladstone - Temple Em.; Larry Rose - parents Mr. and Mrs. Sheldon Rose - B.M.H.; Barry Auerbach - parents Mr. and Mrs. Ralph Auerbach Hillel Acad.; #546.''

mods.abstract: Max Frankel stands to the left of the nine students who are B'nai B'rith Lodge 171 Cowan Contest Winners. The students are back row left to right, Pam Kamlet, Allah Gladstone, Larry Rose, and Barry Auerbach, and front row left to right, Cynthia Miller, Brenda Goorian, Marv Segall, Anne Hermann, and Susan Freeman.
mods.note: Donated by B'nai B'rith Institute of Judaism.
